mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, apt_id, notice_writer, notice_content, notice_title, remk, ins_id, ins_date, upd_id, upd_date FROM tb_o_notice ORDER BY ins_date DESC
SELECT notice_no, apt_id, notice_writer, notice_content, notice_title, remk, ins_id, ins_date, upd_id, upd_date FROM tb_o_notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_o_notice ( notice_no, apt_id, notice_writer, notice_content, notice_title, remk, ins_id, ins_date ) VALUES ( ( select ifnull(max(notice_no)+1, concat(date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d'),'0001') ) from tb_o_notice ALIAS_FOR_SUBQUERY where left(notice_no,8) = date_format(now(),'%Y%m%d') order by notice_no desc ), #{aptId}, #{noticeWriter}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeTitle}, #{remark}, #{insId}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_o_notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, remk = #{remark}, upd_id = #{updId}, upd_date = now() WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
